name: Provirente
description:
Capture all the treasures! But beware... mysterious enemies will do everything possible to defeat you. Be careful and good luck!

Controls

Move left: A key, Left arrow key.

Move right: D key, Right arrow key.

Jump: W key, Up arrow key

A game by Amado Mata.

Proudly built with libGDX.

Entry participant in the libGDX Jam 20!
